ygData.subject: RE: Lullaby interrupting casters
ygData.msgSnippet: What level are people who have trouble with casters?  I have not had any trouble with casting bandits, necros in Befallen, orc casters in Kithicor etc.  Even
ygData.messageBody:
What level are people who have trouble with casters? I have not had any
trouble with casting bandits, necros in Befallen, orc casters in Kithicor
etc. Even the ones that con yellow to me are possibly beatable. On the
other hand I have a difficult time with the tank variety of monsters. This
seems totally contrary to what other bards are experiencing so I wonder what
the big difference is? I am currently level 15 and have dealt well with
casters since about level 10.

Kitasi the confused

-----Original Message-----
From: DreamKing [mailto:drmking@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 2:50 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lullaby interrupting casters


From: DreamKing <drmking@...>


>a caster! Casters rule EverQuest, plain and simple.

You're exactly right. I can usually take on a non-casting type yellow
conning derv alone. But I'm very lucky if I can survive a green conning
derv or madman that is a caster.. It's almost humorous how they never seem
to run out of mana too.

--
DreamKing - ICQ 172158 - drmking@...
"Boo Boopie Doo Yeah" - Jewel
